This contains 6 toast DVD images, the keygen, and a kernel extension. 4 of the images contain the installer files, and the other 2 are docs, extra contents, and Adobe video tutorials.

If you're installing it and you get the blank white dialog window when you're asked to switch discs, that's because Safari 3 beta is messing about with it. Uninstall Safari 3 beta before installing. It's included in the Safari 3 installation DMG from the apple site.

The included keygen is a Windows program. It allows for the usual telephone activation key thing.

To those wondering what a hackintosh is, it's an ordinary Intel PC that's running a hacked version of Mac OS X. It seems like these Adobe apps have some conflict with these modded Mac OS Xes, so the included kernel extension (AppleSMBIOS.kext) is supposedly able to take care of this problem.

How to fix the Repair Activation issue:

Browse to Applications > Adobe Photoshop CS3, and right-click on the actual Photoshop application. Choose "Show Package Contents," and now browse to Contents > Resources > AMT. Open up application.xml in a text editor. Find the key that looks like , and delete everything inside the quotation marks. Save the file, close the finder windows, and reopen Photoshop.

You should be looking at a fresh registration window asking for your serial number. Now go about following the original instructions, and you will have a working installation.

Sorry, post deleted key. Here's what you're looking for:

Found the solution to the repair activation issue.

Navigate to the Library/Preferences/FLEXnet Publisher/FLEXnet folder

Delete everything inside, empty the trash.

Launch again, use keygen.exe per the original instructions.

FOR reactivation issue:
Go to %ALLUSERSPROFILE%\Application Data\FLEXnet
(c:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\FLEXnet\)
and rename the adobe_*_tsf.data file (Adobe apps must not be running)

After that, when You start an Adobe app You will then see a registration window where You could enter Your new legit registration data.
